## jx-test gc

Garbage collects test resources

### Usage

```
jx-test gc
```

### Synopsis

Garbage collects test resources

### Examples

  jx-test gc

### Options

```
  -d, --duration duration   How long before the test is deleted if it does not have a delete flag (default 2h0m0s)
  -h, --help                help for gc
  -n, --ns string           the namespace to filter the TestRun resources
```
